nodes.text: The knife was a handheld melee weapon used for slashing and stabbing. A knife could also be used as a cutting tool or utensil.

Galley knife referred to knives used in a starship's galley. In 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance recruit Corbo carried a galley knife when attempting to visit the Imperial defector Everi Chalis regarding his pet felinx which had died under her orders.
After the First Order attack on Tuanul, Rey used a knife to free BB-8 from Teedo's net.
